
  .. _RO_0002584:
  .. _has part structure that is capable of:
  .. index:: 
     single: RO_0002584; has part structure that is capable of
     single: has part structure that is capable of; RO_0002584

RO_0002584 - has part structure that is capable of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for has part structure that is capable of

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    s 'has part structure that is capable of' p if and only if there exists some part x such that s 'has part' x and x 'capable of' p


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    gland SubClassOf 'has part structure that is capable of' some 'secretion by cell'


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
